    CollationElements { "& A < \u00E6\u0301 , \u00C6\u0301& Z < \u00E6 , \u00C6; a\u0308 , A\u0308 < \u00F8 , \u00D8 ; o\u0308 , O\u0308 ; o\u030B, O\u030B< a\u030A , A\u030A, aa , aA , Aa , AA  & V, w, W & Y ; u\u0308 , U\u0308" }

        DK { "Danmark" }

        da { "dansk" }

    }
    ShortLanguage { "dan" }
    localPatternChars { "GuMtkHmsSEDFwWahKzZ" }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimeElements:intvector{
                    2,
                    4,
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "HH:mm:ss z",
                    "HH:mm:ss z",
                    "HH:mm:ss",
                    "HH:mm",
                    "d. MMMM yyyy",
                    "d. MMMM yyyy",
                    "dd-MM-yyyy",
                    "dd-MM-yy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "s\u00F8",

                            "l\u00F8",
                    }

                            "fredag",
                            "l\u00F8rdag",
                    }
                }
            }

                format{
